casebody.data:
Lester Ray NICHOLS, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES. No. 15-5238. Supreme Court of the United States Nov. 6, 2015.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit granted limited to Question 1 presented by the petition.
